text: I didn’t, not sure what the cause was (maybe some library I had installed). In any case you need to be sure all your project files set up correctly. DM me if you’re still stuck and I can try and help.
Yes, but having a hard time recalling what the cause was. Any errors when running the dev server?
No issues locally, this turned out to be a problem because of an empty “modules” folder under the components
Oh, not the same problem I had. Good to know!

Hey <@U06UVUMDE3Z>, in my case this turned out to be an issue caused by a an empty “modules” folder in the components, at the moment I only have partials in my project and modules was left empty… apparently this was the root cause of the build fail, this is something that will be fixed in the future by the maintainers i believe.
This is fixed now in production, so module free builds  should be :ok:
Oh wow, that is actually EXACTLY what the case was for me back then.

Forgot to share this in here but looks like the tailwind team fixed our import.meta issue with intellisense

<https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss-intellisense/issues/909>
Also anyone have a standardized way of having there only be 1 build process for having tailwind in the theme folder and in the project folder?
so we don't get double the css
Quick question: Is it possible to render partials in the client? Or just island modules?
